alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 7:13PM CDT until July 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Saline County in central Arkansas... Central Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 713 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Maumelle, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... Mayflower... Argenta... Otter Creek... Burns Park... Morgan... Marche... Chenal Valley... Oak Grove in Pulaski County... Roland in Pulaski County... Pinnacle Mountain State Park... Sweet Home... Camp Robinson... Geyer Springs... Mabelvale... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 129 and 142. Interstate 40 between mile markers 135 and 154. Interstate 430 between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 530 between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 630 between mile markers 1 and 7. Interstate 440 between mile markers 1 and 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
